Description:
The ghost tells you that with the materials available here, he can only work on the armor of one of you.

He explains that he was on his way to the city to craft armor for an officer, but his ship never made it through the storm. He believes the storm in this place has imbued him with new powers, and he won't be able to rest in peace until he tests them by creating new armor.

He begs you to give him something to work with.
DescriptionAction: He asks if any of you have an armor worthy of his craftsmanship.
